name: Anophiloi
movement: 30 feet walking, 20 feet climbing, 40 feet flying
description: The Anophiloi is a small, predatory monstrosity known for its agility and deadly attack patterns. It has sharp claws and a vicious bite, suited for ambushing weakened foes.
memorable: Its ability to drain the life force from its victims makes it particularly terrifying in combat, especially against vulnerable enemies.
goals: The Anophiloi seeks to ambush and weaken its prey, thriving on the chaos of battle.
relations: It may be encountered with other vile predators or creatures that inhabit dark, chaotic environments.
environment: Typically found in dark, chaotic settings where it can effectively ambush its prey.
strengths: Highly effective against weakened prey due to its Blood Frenzy ability, and its agility allows it to navigate diverse terrains.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage and possesses below-average intelligence, limiting its strategic abilities.
attacks: Utilizes Multiattack to make two separate assaults with claws and a bite, and can latch onto larger foes to drain their life.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Frenzy allows it to gain advantage on melee attacks against creatures that are not at full health.
senses: Possesses Blood Sense, enabling it to detect living creatures within 30 feet by scent.
skills: Stealthy with a +4 proficiency, allowing it to surprise opponents easily.
additional_information: Can be detached by a Strength check
